text: :point_up::skin-tone-2: currently I cannot achieve multiple rows in a section when there are already multiple columns existing in the section
But achieving multiple rows in a section works if there is only a single column setup to begin with
FYI this has been a source of frustration for content editors that I have spoken with.

Around the 0:15 mark in the second video, I feel like I had to drag the module way too far towards the middle to figure out that I could get a multicolumn row under the first richtext module. Maybe have the thickened/opacified blue line appear sooner.
Hey John, thanks for the feedback. We have an open issue on our end where we’re discussing this problem. Appreciate your patience.
Thank you for letting me know… It’s always nice when i can tell a client that HubSpot is working on it :wink:
